description: Preference Strength – behavior-focused signals that gently tilt archetype scores. Likert scales run from Strongly disagree to Strongly agree.

questions.question_text: Playful challenge quickly restores my energy with people.
How often do you kick off a fun pattern-break when the vibe stalls?
Trying unfamiliar things is a net positive for me—even if they’re a little awkward at first.
When curiosity strikes, how often do you choose a detour over the original plan?
Predictable rhythms help me be more present, generous, and steady for others.
How often do you maintain simple, supportive routines for yourself or your relationships?
Clear, decisive moves feel kinder than prolonged ambiguity when stakes rise.
How often do you take responsibility for setting the pace under time pressure?
Craft and finesse improve my enjoyment more than novelty does.
How often do you refine small details before beginning something meaningful?
Naming feelings or intentions helps me and others feel safer and clearer.
How often do people ask you to help make sense of what they’re feeling or noticing?
Small rituals meaningfully change my headspace and the tone of shared moments.
How often do you create an opening or closing moment to mark experiences?
